current_events.description: A fun Easter event for figuring out clues to find the easter bunny in local businesses! April 16-19 A gift certificate to the Chamber of Commerce bussinesses is awarded to the finder!
An event to find the bussiness you need, donate for benefits, join the commerce or just have fun! On March 29 6:00pm at High Country Trailer Sales. 90 Industrial Park Rd Saint Anthony, ID 83445
